response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. This product, which I am confident you will find invaluable, is worth $1,200,000 to me. Considering its significance and the impact it could have on you, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price.

In light of our mutual interests and the potential this product holds, I propose a transaction price of $1,100,000. This offer reflects my desire to see the product go to someone who appreciates its true worth and can make the most of its capabilities.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial considerations. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together to bring this valuable asset into your possession.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
